title: Textile, 1930s
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: hand screen printed on plain weave
inscribed: In pencil on pack: A. Nedboy 10 years.
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Ella Ostrowsky
description: Brick repeat of face of an Native American Indian girl with flowers on either side. Printed in two colors: rust and dark green (rust over green for brown).
